summary: Makes each city has one map marker.
descriptionHtml:
Every city has too many map markers since theres one for the castle and the stables. This will fix that so there is only one map marker for each city and it will be at the city stables. You can choose to have them visible and not be able to fast travel to or not visible at all by downloading the visible or non-visible file. If you want the Skyrim Special Edition version go [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/1001/?]here[/url]. Also check out my [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/74880/?]Skyrim City Map Markers[/url] mod. And if you have Oblivion also check out my [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/oblivion/mods/38387/?]Oblivion Single City Map Markers[/url].

Requirements
Skyrim

To install just download then extract folder and drag plugin, and bsa into your data folder.
author: LegoManIAm94
